name: BoxLand Adventure - adventure 2d game 2017
description:
It is side scrolling platformer  box jumping games which is hard game 2017 latest 

So............,

ARE YOU LOOKING FOR SOMETHING CHALLENGING ???

WeLcome to BoxLand,
           Recently, Precious Treasure of BoxLand is Stolen. You are Citizen of BoxLand, who can only Jump ( Of Course, They don't have Legs in BoxLand ) and Task to save BoxLand falls to YOU. And Hence Adventure Begins !!!
          Take a Control, Jump in directions by pointing, Navigate through Mysterious Lands. It is Physics based Platformer with Easy control and Beautiful Environment.

Now You can Play in Browser :

    http://www.kongregate.com/games/KunalShJadhav/boxland-adventure
